alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms in portions of northwest Oakland, northeast Livingston and southern Genesee Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 540 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Byron to near Hartland. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could damage unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Linden around 600 PM EDT. Fenton around 610 PM EDT. Lake Fenton around 615 PM EDT. Holly around 630 PM EDT. Grand Blanc around 635 PM EDT. Clarkston around 640 PM EDT. Pontiac, Goodrich and Ortonville around 645 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Atlas, Waterford, Davisburg, White Lake, Holly State Recreation Area, Rose Center, Argentine, Tyrone Township, Deerfield Township and Sylvan Lake. People attending Pine Knob Music Theatre should seek safe shelter as these storms approach! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
